name: Let the Sushi Roll
description:
You, as the player, help  Atamago and Ryu make sushi. They are two Sushi Makers with a boss who doesn't care about how fast or frequent they give task to their employees. You have to help them make and distribute sushi, but don't let the sushi get out of control, or you will be fired.

________

AAAAAAH THE TUTORIAL LOOKS AWFUL!! I'M SO SORRY

Atamago is controlled with the Z, X and C keys, which do the following:

  • Cut the sushi rolls;
  • Place salmon;
  • Tie with Nori seaweed

respectively.

Ryu is controlled with the mouse. To grab sushi,  hold the left click, and to put it in the corresponding box, move the mouse and release the left click.

You lose hearts when you make mistakes, like placing sushi in the wrong box or straight up leaving a sushi go.

When you lose 3 hearts, that's it.
